TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlnsDefinitionAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Can be optionally applied to a workflow assembly. It defines a mapping between a common language runtime namespace that is defined in the current assembly and an XML namespace. This information is used in extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) serialization/deserialization when activities or workflows that are defined in the assembly decorated with this attribute are used. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string xmlNamespace, string clrNamespace) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace%2A>.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the value for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace%2A>.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.XmlNamespace%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute.ClrNamespace%2A> properties.
Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> that represents the <xref:System.Type.Assembly%2A> name of the decorated class.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that represents the <xref:System.Type.Assembly%2A> name of the decorated class.

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the CLR namespace of the decorated class.

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
Docs.value: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the XML namespace of the decorated class.
